description:
Last June, Nextcloud started as an ownCloud fork; a first release came less than two weeks later!

Today, plans are already taking shape. Where is the project going?  Key for Nextcloud is community: working, in the open, with others. We'll talk about calendar and contacts, communication and productivity, enterprise functionality, upgrading, distribution packaging and more.

Jos Poortvliet
title: The future of private clouds
